contentrichtext.text: [[Image:HondurasCopan.png|right|Location of Copán department]] '''Copán''' is one of the [[Departments of Honduras|departments]] in the western part of [[Honduras]]. The departmental capital is the town of [[Santa Rosa de Copán]]. The department is well known for its [[tobacco]] and fine [[cigars]]. The department is famous for its [[Pre-Columbian]] archaeological site at [[Copán]], one of the greatest cities of the [[Maya civilization]]. The department of Copán covers a total surface area of 3,203 km² and, in 2005, had an estimated population of about 320,562 people. ==Municipalities== # [[Cabañas, Copán|Cabañas]] # [[Concepción, Copán|Concepción]] # [[Copán Ruinas]] # [[Corquín]] # [[Cucuyagua]] # [[Dolores, Copán|Dolores]] # [[Dulce Nombre]] # [[El Paraíso]] # [[Florida, Copán|Florida]] # [[La Jigua]] # [[La Unión, Copán|La Unión]] # [[Nueva Arcadia]] # [[San Agustín, Copán|San Agustín]] # [[San Antonio, Copán|San Antonio]] # [[San Jerónimo, Copán|San Jerónimo]] # [[San José, Copán|San José]] # [[San Juan de Opoa]] # [[San Nicolás, Copán|San Nicolás]] # [[San Pedro de Copán]] # [[Santa Rita, Copán|Santa Rita]] # [[Santa Rosa de Copán, Copán|Santa Rosa de Copán]] # [[Trinidad de Copán]] # [[Veracruz, Copán]] {{Honduras}} {{coord|14|46|N|88|47|W|source:itwiki_region:HN|display=title}} [[Category:Copán Department| ]] [[Category:Departments of Honduras]] {{Honduras-geo-stub}}
